trans-unit.source: Drag and drop is an intuitive way for users to copy or move data around in an application, and is used in many desktop environments as a mechanism for copying data between applications. Drag and drop support in Qt is centered around the QDrag class that handles most of the details of a drag and drop operation.

Drag and drop is not limited to text and images. Any type of information can be transferred in a drag and drop operation. To drag information between applications, the applications must be able to indicate to each other which data formats they can accept and which they can produce. This is achieved using MIME types. The QDrag object constructed by the source contains a list of MIME types that it uses to represent the data (ordered from most appropriate to least appropriate), and the drop target uses one of these to access the data. For common data types, the convenience functions handle the MIME types used transparently but, for custom data types, it is necessary to state them explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 拖放不仅限于文本和图像。任何类型的信息都可以通过拖放操作进行传输。为了在应用程序之间拖动信息，应用程序必须能够相互指示它们可以接受哪些数据格式以及可以产生哪些数据格式。这是使用MIME类型实现的。由源构造的QDrag对象包含它用来表示数据的MIME类型列表（从最合适的到最不合适的顺序），而放置目标使用其中之一来访问数据。对于常见的数据类型，便捷功能处理透明使用的MIME类型，但对于自定义数据类型，必须明确声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop provides a simple visual mechanism which users can use to transfer information between and within applications.
trans-unit.target: 拖放提供了一个简单的可视化机制,用户可以使用它在应用程序之间和应用程序内部传输信息。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop provides a simple visual mechanism which users can use to transfer information between and within applications. Drag and drop is similar in function to the clipboard's cut and paste mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 拖放提供了一个简单的可视化机制,用户可以用它在应用程序之间和应用程序内部传输信息。拖放的功能类似于剪贴板的剪切和粘贴机制。

trans-unit.source: Drawer is a special type of popup that resides at one of the window edges. By default, Drawer re-parents itself to the window overlay, and therefore operates on window coordinates. It is also possible to manually set the parent to something else to make the drawer operate in a specific coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 抽屉是一种特殊的弹出窗口，驻留在窗口边缘之一。默认情况下，“抽屉”会将其自身重新父化到窗口叠加层，因此将对窗口坐标进行操作。也可以手动将父对象设置为其他对象，以使抽屉在特定的坐标空间中运行。

trans-unit.source: Drawer is a special type of popup that resides at one of the window edges. By default, Drawer re-parents itself to the window overlay, and therefore operates on window coordinates. trans-unit.source: Drawing directly to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer outside the GUI/main thread is possible by reimplementing paintEvent() to do nothing. The context's thread affinity has to be changed via QObject::moveToThread(). After that, makeCurrent() and doneCurrent() are usable on the worker thread. Be careful to move the context back to the GUI/main thread afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 通过重新实现paintEvent（）不执行任何操作，可以在GUI /主线程外部直接绘制到QOpenGLWidget的帧缓冲区。上下文的线程相似性必须通过QObject :: moveToThread（）进行更改。在那之后，makeCurrent（）和doneCurrent（）在工作线程上可用。之后请小心将上下文移回GUI /主线程。

trans-unit.source: Drawing directly to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer outside the GUI/main thread is possible by reimplementing paintEvent() to do nothing. The context's thread affinity has to be changed via QObject::moveToThread(). After that, makeCurrent() and doneCurrent() are usable on the worker thread. Be careful to move the context back to the GUI/main thread afterwards.

Drawing slice frames is independent of drawing slices, so you can show the full volume and still draw the slice frames around it. This is useful when using renderSlice() to display the slices outside the graph itself.
trans-unit.target: 工程图切片框架独立于工程图切片，因此您可以显示完整的体积，但仍围绕其绘制工程图框架。当使用renderSlice（）在图本身之外显示切片时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Drawing textured quads, in order to get the contents of a texture onto the screen, is a common operation when developing 2D user interfaces. QOpenGLTextureBlitter provides a convenience class to avoid repeating vertex data, shader sources, buffer and program management and matrix calculations.
trans-unit.target: 在开发2D用户界面时，常见的操作是绘制带纹理的四边形以便将纹理的内容显示到屏幕上。QOpenGLTextureBlitter提供了一个便利类，可避免重复顶点数据，着色器源，缓冲区和程序管理以及矩阵计算。

trans-unit.source: Drawing textured quads, in order to get the contents of a texture onto the screen, is a common operation when developing 2D user interfaces. QOpenGLTextureBlitter provides a convenience class to avoid repeating vertex data, shader sources, buffer and program management and matrix calculations.

trans-unit.source: Dropped data is handled by a model's reimplementation of QAbstractItemModel::dropMimeData(). For example, a model that handles a simple list of strings can provide an implementation that handles data dropped onto existing items separately to data dropped into the top level of the model (i.e., onto an invalid item).
trans-unit.target: 删除的数据通过模型对QAbstractItemModel :: dropMimeData（）的重新实现来处理。例如，处理字符串的简单列表的模型可以提供一种实现，该实现将处理放入现有项目中的数据与放入模型顶层（即放入无效项目中）的数据分开处理。

Due to a bug on some devices, when you turn off predictive text with ImhNoPredictiveText, this property is ignored and predictive text is still enabled. To work around this, set the QT_ANDROID_ENABLE_WORKAROUND_TO_DISABLE_PREDICTIVE_TEXT environment variable to 1. However, one side effect is that this environment variable can cause a problem with other keyboards such as Gboard. If you use a language like Japanese, with Gboard, only a QWERTY keyboard is displayed. This environment variable is queried each time the keyboard is displayed, so it's possible to toggle the workaround on and off, as necessary.

Due to being backed by a framebuffer object, the behavior of QOpenGLWidget is very similar to QOpenGLWindow with the update behavior set to PartialUpdateBlit or PartialUpdateBlend. This means that the contents are preserved between paintGL() calls so that incremental rendering is possible. With QGLWidget (and naturally QOpenGLWindow with the default update behavior) this is usually not the case because swapping the buffers leaves the back buffer with undefined contents.
trans-unit.target: 由于一个帧缓冲区对象被支持，行为QOpenGLWidget非常相似QOpenGLWindow与更新行为设置为 PartialUpdateBlit 或 PartialUpdateBlend 。这意味着在两次paintGL（）调用之间保留了内容，从而可以进行增量渲染。使用QGLWidget（自然是具有默认更新行为的QOpenGLWindow）通常不是这种情况，因为交换缓冲区将使后缓冲区保留未定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: Due to being backed by a framebuffer object, the behavior of QOpenGLWidget is very similar to QOpenGLWindow with the update behavior set to PartialUpdateBlit or PartialUpdateBlend. This means that the contents are preserved between paintGL() calls so that incremental rendering is possible. With QGLWidget (and naturally QOpenGLWindow with the default update behavior) this is usually not the case because swapping the buffers leaves the back buffer with undefined contents.
Due to historic reasons QPageSize::Executive is not the same as the standard Postscript and Windows Executive size, use QPageSize::ExecutiveStandard instead.

trans-unit.source: Due to how Scope and Naming Resolution works in QML, it is possible to reference the id of the application root element anywhere in its child QML objects. Even though this approach is fine for many applications and use cases, for a generic QML component it may not be acceptable as it creates a dependency to the surrounding environment.
trans-unit.target: 由于范围和命名解析在QML中的工作方式，可以在子QML对象中的任何地方引用应用程序根元素的 id 。即使此方法对于许多应用程序和用例来说都很好，但对于通用QML组件，由于它会创建对周围环境的依赖关系，因此可能不可接受。

trans-unit.source: Due to how Scope and Naming Resolution works in QML, it is possible to reference the id of the application root element anywhere in its child QML objects. Even though this approach is fine for many applications and use cases, for a generic QML component it may not be acceptable as it creates a dependency to the surrounding environment.

Due to license incompatibilities with the GPL, users of the Qt Open Source Edition are not allowed to link this plugin to the commercial editions of InterBase. Please use Firebird or the free edition of InterBase.

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations of the QRegExp API it was impossible to implement global matching correctly (that is, like Perl does). In particular, patterns that can match 0 characters (like "a*") are problematic.
trans-unit.target: 由于QRegExp API的限制，不可能正确地实现全局匹配（也就是说，像Perl一样）。特别是，可以匹配0个字符的模式（例如 "a*" ）是有问题的。

trans-unit.source: Due to platform limitations, overlapping the WebView with other QML components is not supported. Doing this will have unpredictable results which may differ from platform to platform.
trans-unit.target: 由于平台的限制，不支持将WebView与其他QML组件重叠。这样做会产生不可预测的结果，可能因平台而异。

trans-unit.source: Due to some limitations, the Linux QPA plugin almost always reports that accessibility should be activated. On big HTML pages, this can cause a significant slowdown in rendering speed.

trans-unit.source: Due to the unsorted nature of the scatter data, any change in the data window ranges requires all data points to be checked for visibility, which can cause increasing slowdown if data is continually added to the proxy. For the best performance with the scatter graphs, only keep the data you need in the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 由于散点数据的未排序性质,数据窗口范围的任何变化都需要检查所有数据点的可见性,如果数据不断添加到代理中,会导致速度越来越慢。为了获得散点图的最佳性能,请只在代理中保留您需要的数据。

Duplicate skipping is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,重复跳转是被禁用的。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate skipping is not just enabled for readings that are exactly the same, but also for readings that are quite similar, as each sensor has a bit of jitter even if the device is not moved.
trans-unit.target: 重复跳过不仅对完全相同的读数启用,而且对相当相似的读数也启用,因为即使设备没有移动,每个传感器也会有一点抖动。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate skipping takes effect when the sensor is started, changing the property while the sensor is active has no immediate effect.
trans-unit.target: 重复跳过在传感器启动时生效,在传感器处于活动状态时改变属性不会立即生效。

trans-unit.source: During a touch gesture, from the time that the first finger is pressed until the last finger is released, each touchpoint will have a unique ID number. Likewise, if input from multiple devices occurs (for example simultaneous mouse and touch presses), all the current event points from all the devices will have unique IDs.
trans-unit.target: 在触摸手势中,从按下第一个手指到松开最后一个手指,每个触摸点都会有一个唯一的ID号。同样,如果发生来自多个设备的输入(例如同时按下鼠标和触摸),所有设备的所有当前事件点都将拥有唯一的ID。

trans-unit.source: During cursor navigation in the associated editor, you can ask the current QTextBlock (retrieved using the QTextCursor::block() function) if it has a user data object set and cast it to your BlockData object. Then you can check if the current cursor position matches with a previously recorded parenthesis position, and, depending on the type of parenthesis (opening or closing), find the next opening or closing parenthesis on the same level.
trans-unit.target: 在关联的编辑器中的光标导航期间，您可以询问当前的QTextBlock（使用QTextCursor :: block（）函数检索）是否设置了用户数据对象，并将其 BlockData 为您的BlockData对象。然后，您可以检查当前光标位置是否与先前记录的括号位置相匹配，并根据括号的类型（打开或关闭），在相同级别上找到下一个打开或关闭括号。

trans-unit.source: During development, the directory for plugins is QTDIR/plugins (where QTDIR is the directory where Qt is installed), with each type of plugin in a subdirectory for that type, for example, styles. If you want your applications to use plugins and you don't want to use the standard plugins path, have your installation process determine the path you want to use for the plugins, and save the path, for example, by using QSettings, for the application to read when it runs. The application can then call QCoreApplication::addLibraryPath() with this path and your plugins will be available to the application. Note that the final part of the path (for example, styles) cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 在开发过程中，插件的目录为 QTDIR/plugins （其中 QTDIR 是Qt的安装目录），每种类型的插件都位于该类型的子目录中，例如 styles 。如果您希望应用程序使用插件，而又不想使用标准插件路径，请让安装过程确定要用于插件的路径，然后保存该路径，例如，使用QSettings来保存。运行时读取的应用程序。然后，应用程序可以使用此路径调用QCoreApplication :: addLibraryPath（），您的插件将对应用程序可用。请注意，路径的最后部分（例如 styles ）不能更改。

trans-unit.source: During discovery, some information can change dynamically, such as signal strength and manufacturerData. This signal informs you that if your application is displaying this data, it can be updated, rather than waiting until the discovery has finished.
trans-unit.target: 在发现期间，某些信息会动态变化，例如信号强度和ManufacturerData。该信号通知您，如果您的应用程序正在显示此数据，则可以对其进行更新，而不必等到发现完成为止。

trans-unit.source: During query execution, the engine iterates over the node model using nextFromSimpleAxis() to get the index of the next node to be visited. The engine can get the name of a node by calling name() with the node's index. stringValue(), baseUri(), documentUri() and kind() are also called as needed with a node index.
trans-unit.target: 在查询执行期间，引擎使用nextFromSimpleAxis（）遍历节点模型以获取下一个要访问的节点的索引。引擎可以通过使用节点的index调用name（）来获取节点的名称。还可根据需要使用节点索引调用stringValue（），baseUri（），documentUri（）和kind（）。

trans-unit.source: During startup, if a QML file includes an external JavaScript file with "global" code, it is executed in a scope that contains only the external file itself and the global object. That is, it will not have access to the QML objects and properties it normally would.

During startup, if a QML file includes an external JavaScript file with "global" code, it is executed in a scope that contains only the external file itself and the global object. That is, it will not have access to the QML objects and properties it normally would.
trans-unit.target: 在启动过程中，如果QML文件包含带有“全局”代码的外部JavaScript文件，则会在仅包含外部文件本身和全局对象的作用域中执行该文件。也就是说，它将无法正常访问QML对象和属性。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is a platform plugin for running Qt 5 applications on top of EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0 without an actual windowing system (like X11 or Wayland). In addition to Qt Quick 2 and native OpenGL applications it supports software-rendered windows (for example QWidget) too. In the latter case the widgets' contents are rendered using the CPU into images which are then uploaded into textures and composited by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是一个平台插件，用于在EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0之上运行Qt 5应用程序，而无需实际的窗口系统（例如X11或Wayland）。除了Qt Quick 2和本机OpenGL应用程序之外，它还支持软件渲染的窗口（例如QWidget）。在后一种情况下，小部件的内容使用CPU渲染为图像，然后将其上载为纹理并由插件进行合成。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is a platform plugin for running Qt5 applications on top of EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0, without an actual windowing system like X11 or Wayland. In addition to Qt Quick 2 and native OpenGL applications, EGLFS supports software-rendered windows, like QWidget, too. For QWidget, the widgets' contents are rendered using the CPU into images, which are then uploaded into textures and composited by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是一个平台插件，用于在EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0之上运行Qt5应用程序，而没有像X11或Wayland这样的实际窗口系统。除了Qt Quick 2和本机OpenGL应用程序之外，EGLFS还支持软件渲染的窗口，例如QWidget。对于QWidget，小部件的内容使用CPU渲染为图像，然后将其上载为纹理并由插件进行合成。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is the default plugin on many boards. If it's not suitable, use the QT_QPA_PLATFORM environment variable to request another plugin. Alternatively, for quick tests, use the -platform command-line argument with the same syntax.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是许多主板上的默认插件。如果不合适，请使用 QT_QPA_PLATFORM 环境变量来请求另一个插件。另外，对于快速测试，请使用具有相同语法的 -platform 命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Each WorkerScript instance can have one .js script attached to it. When WorkerScript.sendMessage() is called, the script will run in a separate thread (and a separate QML context). When the script finishes running, it can send a reply back to the GUI thread which will invoke the WorkerScript.onMessage() signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 每个WorkerScript实例可以附加一个 .js 脚本。当WorkerScript.sendMessage（）被调用时，该脚本将在一个单独的线程（和单独运行QML上下文）。脚本完成运行后，可以将回复发送回GUI线程，该线程将调用WorkerScript.onMessage（）信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each WorkerScript instance can have one .js script attached to it. When WorkerScript.sendMessage() is called, the script will run in a separate thread (and a separate QML context). When the script finishes running, it can send a reply back to the GUI thread which will invoke the WorkerScript.onMessage() signal handler.

Each QtQuick::Sprite in this list is interpreted as corresponding to the particle group with the same name. Any transitions defined in these sprites will take effect on the particle groups as well. Additionally TrailEmitters, Affectors and ParticlePainters defined inside one of these sprites are automatically associated with the corresponding particle group.
trans-unit.target: 此列表中的每个QtQuick :: Sprite都被解释为对应于具有相同名称的粒子组。这些精灵中定义的任何过渡也会对粒子组产生影响。此外，在这些精灵之一中定义的TrailEmitters，Affector和ParticlePainters会自动与相应的粒子组关联。

Each QPlaceEditorial has a title, text and language; in addition to those properties inherited from QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceEditorial都有标题，文本和语言。除了从QPlaceContent继承的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceImage represents a set of metadata about an image such as it's url, identifier and MIME type. These are properties in addition to those provided by QPlaceContent.

trans-unit.source: Each QSGSimpleMaterialShader implementation operates on a unique state struct. The state struct must be declared using the QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER macro.
trans-unit.target: 每个QSGSimpleMaterialShader实现都在唯一的状态结构上运行。必须使用 QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER 宏声明状态结构。

trans-unit.source: Each QSvgWidget can be constructed with the file name of a SVG file, or they can be constructed without a specific file to render and one can be supplied later. The load() functions provide two different ways to load an SVG file: they accept either the file name of an SVG file or a QByteArray containing the serialized XML representation of an SVG file.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用SVG文件的文件名来构造每个QSvgWidget，也可以不使用要渲染的特定文件来构造它们，以后可以提供它们。所述负载（）函数提供两种不同的方式来加载的SVG文件：它们接受任何的SVG文件的文件名或一个QByteArray中含有的SVG文件的序列化XML表示。

trans-unit.source: Each QNode instance has a unique id that allows it to be recognizable from other instances.
trans-unit.target: 每个QNode实例都有一个唯一的ID，该ID使其可以从其他实例中识别出来。

trans-unit.source: Each QTextBlock object's corresponding QTextLayout object needs to be processed. You can access the QTextBlock's layout using the QTextBlock::layout() function. This processing should take the document's page size into consideration.
trans-unit.target: 每个QTextBlock对象的相应QTextLayout对象都需要处理。您可以使用QTextBlock :: layout（）函数访问QTextBlock的布局。此处理应考虑文档的页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Each QTouchEvent contains a QTouchDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type and capabilities. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to register the available touch devices via QWindowSystemInterface before generating any touch events. Applications do not need to instantiate this class, they should just access the global instances pointed to by QTouchEvent::device().
trans-unit.target: 每个QTouchEvent包含一个QTouchDevice指针，以允许访问设备特定的属性，例如类型和功能。在生成任何触摸事件之前，平台或通用插件有责任通过QWindowSystemInterface注册可用的触摸设备。应用程序不需要实例化此类，它们仅应访问QTouchEvent :: device（）指向的全局实例。

trans-unit.source: Each QTouchEvent contains a QTouchDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type and capabilities. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to register the available touch devices via QWindowSystemInterface before generating any touch events. Applications do not need to instantiate this class, they should just access the global instances pointed to by QTouchEvent::device().

Each Qt Quick Controls 2 style requests a default icon size and color according to their guidelines, but it is possible to override these by setting the icon.width, icon.height, and icon.color properties.

trans-unit.source: Each QWebEnginePage object has its own QWebEngineSettings object, which configures the settings for that page. If a setting is not configured for a web engine page, it is looked up in the settings of the profile the page belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 每个QWebEnginePage对象都有其自己的QWebEngineSettings对象，该对象配置该页面的设置。如果未为Web引擎页面配置设置，则在该页面所属的配置文件的设置中查找该设置。

trans-unit.source: Each Place has a favorite property which is intended to contain the corresponding place from the destination plugin (the place itself is sourced from the origin plugin). Because both the original place and favorite instances are available, the developer can choose which properties to show to the user. For example the favorite may have a modified name which should be displayed rather than the original name.
trans-unit.target: 每个Place都有一个favorite属性,它的目的是包含来自目的插件的相应地方(地方本身就来自于原插件)。因为原始地方和收藏夹实例都是可用的,开发者可以选择向用户显示哪些属性。例如,收藏夹可能有一个修改过的名字,应该显示而不是原来的名字。

Each QML component in a QML document defines a logical scope. Each document has at least one root component, but can also have other inline sub-components. The component scope is the union of the object ids within the component and the component's root object's properties.
trans-unit.target: QML文档中的每个QML组件都定义了一个逻辑范围。每个文档至少有一个根组件,但也可以有其他内联子组件。组件范围是组件内的对象id和组件的根对象属性的联合。

trans-unit.source: Each QML component is instantiated in a QQmlContext. QQmlContext's are essential for passing data to QML components. In QML, contexts are arranged hierarchically and this hierarchy is managed by the QQmlEngine.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML组件都在QQmlContext中实例化。QQmlContext对于将数据传递到QML组件至关重要。在QML中，上下文按层次结构排列，并且此层次结构由QQmlEngine管理。

trans-unit.source: Each QML component is instantiated in a QQmlContext. QQmlContext's are essential for passing data to QML components. In QML, contexts are arranged hierarchically and this hierarchy is managed by the QQmlEngine.
Each QML file must contain the relevant type from the QtQuick.Templates import as the root item. For example, Button.qml must contain a Button template as its root item.
Each QML file must contain the relevant type from the QtQuick.Templates import as the root item. For example, Button.qml must contain a Button template as its root item.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML文件必须包含来自QtQuick.Templates导入的相关类型作为根项目。例如，Button.qml必须包含一个Button模板作为其根项目。

trans-unit.source: Each QNode instance has a unique id that allows it to be recognizable from other instances.

The context properties are defined and updated by calling QQmlContext::setContextProperty(). The following example shows a Qt model being bound to a context and then accessed from a QML file.
Each QSGSimpleMaterialShader implementation operates on a unique state struct. The state struct must be declared using the QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER macro.

Each QSvgWidget can be constructed with the file name of a SVG file, or they can be constructed without a specific file to render and one can be supplied later. The load() functions provide two different ways to load an SVG file: they accept either the file name of an SVG file or a QByteArray containing the serialized XML representation of an SVG file.

Each Qt Quick Item inserts a QSGTransformNode into the scene graph tree to manage its x, y, scale or rotation. Child items will be populated under this transform node. The default renderer tracks the state of transform nodes between frames and will look at subtrees to decide if a transform node is a good candidate to become a root for a set of batches. A transform node which changes between frames and which has a fairly complex subtree can become a batch root.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt快速项目都会在场景图树中插入一个QSGTransformNode来管理其x，y，缩放或旋转。子项将填充在此转换节点下。默认渲染器跟踪帧之间的变换节点的状态，并将查看子树以确定变换节点是否是成为一组批处理的根的良好候选者。在帧之间变化并且具有相当复杂的子树的变换节点可以成为批处理根。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt application has a global thread pool, which is accessible through QThreadPool::globalInstance(). This global thread pool automatically maintains an optimal number of threads based on the number of cores in the CPU. However, a separate QThreadPool can be created and managed explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt应用程序都有一个全局线程池，可以通过QThreadPool :: globalInstance（）访问它。该全局线程池会根据CPU中的内核数自动维护最佳线程数。但是，可以显式创建和管理单独的QThreadPool。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt module that is loaded defines a CMake library target. The target names start with Qt5::, followed by the module name. For example: Qt5::Core, Qt5::Gui. Pass the name of the library target to target_link_libraries to use the respective library.

Each Qt widget has a recommended size, known as sizeHint(). The layout manager will attempt to resize a widget to meet its size hint. In some cases, there is no need to have a different size. For example, the height of a QLineEdit is always a fixed value, depending on font size and style. In other cases, you may require the size to change, e.g., the width of a QLineEdit or the width and height of item view widgets. This is where the widget size constraints -- minimumSize and maximumSize constraints come into play. These are properties you can set in the property editor. For example, to override the default sizeHint(), simply set minimumSize and maximumSize to the same value. Alternatively, to use the current size as a size constraint value, choose one of the Size Constraint options from the widget's context menu. The layout will then ensure that those constraints are met. To control the size of your widgets via code, you can reimplement sizeHint() in your code.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt小部件都有一个建议的大小，称为sizeHint（）。布局管理器将尝试调整窗口小部件的大小，以满足其大小提示。在某些情况下，不需要使用其他大小。例如，QLineEdit的高度始终是固定值，具体取决于字体大小和样式。在其他情况下，您可能需要更改大小，例如QLineEdit的宽度或项目视图小部件的宽度和高度。这是小部件大小约束-minimumSize和maximumSize约束起作用的地方。这些是您可以在属性编辑器中设置的属性。例如，要覆盖默认的sizeHint（），只需设置minimumSize和maximumSize为相同值。或者，要将当前大小用作大小限制值，请从小部件的上下文菜单中选择“ 大小限制”选项之一。然后，布局将确保满足这些约束。要通过代码控制小部件的大小，可以在代码中重新实现sizeHint（）。

trans-unit.source: Each Rectangle item is painted using either a solid fill color, specified using the color property, or a gradient, defined using a Gradient type and set using the gradient property. If both a color and a gradient are specified, the gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 每个Rectangle项目都使用纯色（使用color属性指定）或渐变（使用Gradient类型定义并使用gradient属性设置）来绘制。如果同时指定了颜色和渐变，则使用渐变。

trans-unit.source: Each Repeater creates a number of items by combining each element of data from a model, specified using the model property, with the template item, defined as a child item within the Repeater. The total number of items is determined by the amount of data in the model.
trans-unit.target: 每个Repeater通过将使用model属性指定的来自模型的数据的每个元素与在Repeater中定义为子项的模板项进行组合来创建许多项。项目总数由模型中的数据量确定。

trans-unit.source: Each SSL socket's CA certificate database is initialized to the default CA certificate database.
trans-unit.target: 每个SSL套接字的CA证书数据库都初始化为默认的CA证书数据库。

trans-unit.source: Each action in the action group will match the visible state of this group unless it has been explicitly hidden.
trans-unit.target: 动作组中的每一个动作都将与该组的可见状态相匹配,除非它已被显式隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Each action in the group will be enabled or disabled unless it has been explicitly disabled.
trans-unit.target: 该组中的每个操作都将被启用或禁用,除非它已被明确禁用。

trans-unit.source: Each active output from the outputs array corresponds to one QScreen instance reported from QGuiApplication::screens(). By default, the primary screen that QGuiApplication::primaryScreen() reports is the screen that is registered first. If you're not using virtualIndex, this means the decision is based on the DRM connector order. To override this, set the primary property to true on the desired entry in the outputs list.

Each active output from the outputs array corresponds to one QScreen instance reported from QGuiApplication::screens(). The primary screen reported by QGuiApplication::primaryScreen() is by default the screen that gets registered first. When not using virtualIndex, this means the decision is based on the DRM connector order. To override this, set the property primary to true on the desired entry in the outputs list. For example, to ensure the screen corresponding to the VGA output will be the primary even when the system happens to report the HDMI one first, one can do the following:
trans-unit.target: 从每个有源输出 outputs 阵列对应于一个QScreen例如从报道QGuiApplication ::屏幕（）。默认情况下，QGuiApplication :: primaryScreen（）报告的主屏幕是首先注册的屏幕。当不使用 virtualIndex 时，这意味着决定是基于DRM连接器顺序的。要覆盖此属性，请在 outputs 列表中的所需条目上将 primary 属性设置为 true 。例如，即使系统碰巧先报告HDMI时，也要确保与VGA输出相对应的屏幕将是主要屏幕，可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Each application or library can create one or more instances of QNetworkAccessManager to handle network communication.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序或库都可以创建一个或多个QNetworkAccessManager实例来处理网络通信。

trans-unit.source: Each attribute of a vector3d value is stored internally as a single-precision floating point number (float).
trans-unit.target: vector3d值的每个属性在内部存储为单精度浮点数（ float ）。

trans-unit.source: Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar.
trans-unit.target: 添加到系列中的每一个条形集都为每个堆积的条形集贡献了一个单段。

trans-unit.source: Each batch uses a vertex buffer object (VBO) to store its data on the GPU. This vertex buffer is retained between frames and updated when the part of the scene graph that it represents changes.
trans-unit.target: 每个批次都使用一个顶点缓冲对象(VBO)在GPU上存储其数据。这个顶点缓冲区在帧之间保留,并在它所代表的场景图部分发生变化时更新。

trans-unit.source: Each border line (left, right, top, and bottom) specifies an offset in pixels from the respective edge of the mesh. By default, each border line has a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 每条边线(左、右、上、下)都指定了与网格边缘的偏移量,单位是像素。默认情况下,每条边线的值为0。

trans-unit.source: Each border line (left, right, top, and bottom) specifies an offset in pixels from the respective edge of the source image. By default, each border line has a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 每条边线(左、右、上、下)都指定了从源图像相应边缘的像素偏移量。默认情况下,每条边线的值为0。

trans-unit.source: Each channel can vary between particle by up to colorVariation from its usual color.
trans-unit.target: 每个通道可以在粒子之间变化,从其通常的颜色到colorVariation。

trans-unit.source: Each class defined in a rep file becomes a QObject in the generated header files, with the described API generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 在rep文件中定义的每个类都将在生成的头文件中成为QObject，并为您生成所描述的API。

trans-unit.source: Each class name becomes a link to the class's reference documentation. This command is used to generate the
trans-unit.target: 每个类名都会成为该类参考文档的链接。这个命令用来生成

trans-unit.source: Each class that is a member of the specified module must be marked with the \inmodule command in its \class comment.
trans-unit.target: 属于指定模块成员的每个类都必须在其\ class注释中用\ inmodule命令进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Each code snippet is referenced by the file that holds it and by a unique identifier for that file. Snippet files are typically stored in a snippets directory inside the documentation directory (for example, $QTDIR/doc/src/snippets).
trans-unit.target: 每个代码段均由保存它的文件以及该文件的唯一标识符引用。代码段文件通常存储在文档目录内的代码 snippets 目录中（例如 $QTDIR/doc/src/snippets ）。

trans-unit.source: Each column has a minimum width and a stretch factor. The minimum width is the greatest of that set using setColumnMinimumWidth() and the minimum width of each widget in that column. The stretch factor is set using setColumnStretch() and determines how much of the available space the column will get over and above its necessary minimum.
trans-unit.target: 每列都有最小宽度和拉伸因子。最小宽度是使用setColumnMinimumWidth（）设置的最大宽度，以及该列中每个小部件的最小宽度。拉伸因子是使用setColumnStretch（）设置的，并确定该列将超过其所需的最小值的可用空间量。

trans-unit.source: Each column in an item can have its own background brush which is set with the setBackground() function. The current background brush can be found with background(). The text label for each column can be rendered with its own font and brush. These are specified with the setFont() and setForeground() functions, and read with font() and foreground().
trans-unit.target: 一个项目中的每一列都可以有自己的背景画笔，可以通过setBackground（）函数进行设置。当前背景笔刷的背景为（）。每列的文本标签可以使用其自己的字体和笔刷呈现。这些是使用setFont（）和setForeground（）函数指定的，并使用font（）和前台（）读取。

trans-unit.source: Each component of the texture can be mapped to one of the SwizzleValue options.
trans-unit.target: 可以将纹理的每个组成部分映射到SwizzleValue选项之一。

trans-unit.source: Each container typically allows its child objects to be arranged in one or more layouts. The type of layout management provided depends on each container, although setting the layout is usually just a matter of selecting the container by clicking it, and applying a layout. The table below shows a list of available containers.
trans-unit.target: 每个容器通常允许其子对象以一种或多种布局方式排列。所提供的布局管理类型取决于每个容器,尽管设置布局通常只是通过单击选择容器并应用布局的问题。下表显示了可用容器的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each dash is also subject to cap styles so a dash of 1 with square cap set will extend 0.5 pixels out in each direction resulting in a total width of 2.
trans-unit.target: 每一个破折号也受制于帽型,所以一个1的破折号,如果设置了方形的帽型,就会向每个方向延伸0.5像素,导致总宽度为2。

trans-unit.source: Each displaced item delays its animation by an additional 100 milliseconds, producing a subtle ripple-type effect when items are displaced by the add, like this:
trans-unit.target: 每一个被移位的物品都会额外延迟100毫秒的动画,当物品被添加移位时,会产生一种微妙的波纹型效果,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: Each dock area contains a single stack of tabbed dock widgets. In other words, dock widgets cannot be placed next to each other in a dock area. If this option is set, AllowNestedDocks has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 每个停靠区都包含一叠标签式停靠部件。换句话说,在一个停靠区域中,停靠部件不能相邻放置。如果设置了这个选项,AllowNestedDocks就没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Each document element is described by an associated format object. Each format object is treated as a unique object by QTextDocuments, and can be passed to objectForFormat() to obtain the document element that it is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 每个文档元素均由关联的格式对象描述。QTextDocuments将每个格式对象视为唯一对象，并且可以将其传递给objectForFormat（）以获取要应用到的文档元素。

trans-unit.source: Each document's layout is managed by a subclass of the QAbstractTextDocumentLayout class. This class provides a common interface for layout and rendering engines. The default rendering behavior is currently implemented in a private class. This approach makes it possible to create custom layouts, and provides the mechanism used when preparing pages for printing or exporting to Portable Document Format (PDF) files.
trans-unit.target: 每个文档的布局由QAbstractTextDocumentLayout类的子类管理。此类为布局和渲染引擎提供了一个通用接口。当前，默认呈现行为是在私有类中实现的。这种方法使创建自定义布局成为可能，并提供了准备打印页面或将其导出为可移植文档格式（PDF）文件时使用的机制。

trans-unit.source: Each effect has a set of properties that can be used to configure the effect output. Properties can be animated just like any other QML properties. The QML type documentation contains property descriptions and basic usage examples.
trans-unit.target: 每个效果都有一组属性,可以用来配置效果输出。属性可以像其他QML属性一样被动画化。QML类型文档包含了属性描述和基本的使用示例。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the vector contains the lengths of the dashes and spaces in the stroke, beginning with the first dash in the first element, the first space in the second element, and alternating between dashes and spaces for each following pair of elements.
trans-unit.target: 向量中的每个元素都包含笔画中破折号和空格的长度,从第一个元素中的第一个破折号开始,第二个元素中的第一个空格开始,之后每一对元素的破折号和空格交替出现。

trans-unit.source: Each event has an associated type, defined in QEvent::Type, and this can be used as a convenient source of run-time type information to quickly determine which subclass a given event object was constructed from.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件都有一个关联的类型，在QEvent :: Type中定义，并且可以用作运行时类型信息的便捷来源，以快速确定构造给定事件对象的子类。

trans-unit.source: Each event shall be sent to the TestCase window or, in case of multiple windows, to the current active window. See QGuiApplication::focusWindow() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件应发送到TestCase窗口，或在有多个窗口的情况下，发送到当前活动窗口。有关更多详细信息，请参见QGuiApplication :: focusWindow（）。

trans-unit.source: Each event shall be sent to the TestCase window or, in case of multiple windows, to the current active window. See QGuiApplication::focusWindow() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件应发送到TestCase窗口，或在有多个窗口的情况下，发送到当前活动窗口。有关更多详细信息，请参见QGuiApplication :: focusWindow（）。

trans-unit.target: 每一个姓氏条目,在

trans-unit.source: Each frame contains at least one text block to enable text cursors to insert new document elements within. As a result, the QTextFrame::iterator class is used to traverse both the blocks and child frames within a given frame. The first and last child elements in the frame can be found with begin() and end().
trans-unit.target: 每个框架至少包含一个文本块，以使文本光标能够在其中插入新的文档元素。结果，QTextFrame :: iterator类用于遍历给定帧内的块和子帧。框架中的第一个和最后一个子元素可以通过begin（）和end（）找到。

trans-unit.source: Each frame has one sample per channel.
trans-unit.target: 每帧每通道有一个样本。

trans-unit.source: Each graphics object can be constructed with a parent item. This ensures that the item will be destroyed when its parent item is destroyed. Although QGraphicsObject inherits from both QObject and QGraphicsItem, you should use the functions provided by QGraphicsItem,
trans-unit.target: 每个图形对象都可以使用父项构造。这样可以确保在销毁其父物料时销毁该物料。尽管QGraphicsObject继承自QObject和QGraphicsItem，但是您应该使用QGraphicsItem提供的功能，

trans-unit.source: Each graphics object can be constructed with a parent item. This ensures that the item will be destroyed when its parent item is destroyed. Although QGraphicsObject inherits from both QObject and QGraphicsItem, you should use the functions provided by QGraphicsItem,
Each group has a parent document which is specified when the group is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 每个组都有一个父文档,在构建组时指定。

trans-unit.source: Each group in a model must have a unique name starting with a lower case letter.
trans-unit.target: 一个模型中的每个组必须有一个以小写字母开头的独特名称。

trans-unit.source: Each has certain benefits, typically performance versus quality. Using a framebuffer object avoids a costly upload of the image contents to the texture in graphics memory, while using an image enables high quality anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 每种方式都有一定的好处,典型的就是性能与质量。使用framebuffer对象可以避免将图像内容上传到图形内存中的纹理上,成本很高,而使用图像可以实现高质量的抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: Each header has an orientation() and a number of sections, given by the count() function. A section refers to a part of the header - either a row or a column, depending on the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 每个标头都有一个方向（）和多个部分，由count（）函数给定。节是指标题的一部分-根据方向是行还是列。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation of dropMimeData() must also decode the data and insert it into the model's underlying data structure.
trans-unit.target: dropMimeData（）的每个实现还必须解码数据并将其插入到模型的基础数据结构中。

trans-unit.source: Each index is adjusted for previous changes with all removed items preceding any inserted items.
trans-unit.target: 每个索引都会根据以前的变化进行调整,所有被删除的项目都在任何插入的项目之前。

trans-unit.source: Each instance represents a set of data about a supplier, which can include supplier's name, url and icon. The supplier is typically a business or organization.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例都代表了一组关于供应商的数据,其中可以包括供应商的名称、url和图标。供应商通常是一个企业或组织。

trans-unit.source: Each item can have a two-dimensional table of child items. This makes it possible to build hierarchies of items. The typical hierarchy is the tree, in which case the child table is a table with a single column (a list).
trans-unit.target: 每个项目可以有一个二维的子项目表。这使得建立项目的层次结构成为可能。典型的层次结构是树状结构,在这种情况下,子表是一个单列(列表)的表。

trans-unit.source: Each item can have its own background brush which is set with the setBackground() function. The current background brush can be found with background(). The text label for each item can be rendered with its own font and brush. These are specified with the setFont() and setForeground() functions, and read with font() and foreground().
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有自己的背景画笔，可以使用setBackground（）函数进行设置。当前背景笔刷的背景为（）。每个项目的文本标签都可以使用其自己的字体和笔刷呈现。这些是使用setFont（）和setForeground（）函数指定的，并使用font（）和前台（）读取。

trans-unit.source: Each item can have its own background brush which is set with the setBackground() function. The current background brush can be found with background(). The text label for each item can be rendered with its own font and brush. These are specified with the setFont() and setForeground() functions, and read with font() and foreground().
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有自己的背景画笔，可以使用setBackground（）函数进行设置。当前背景笔刷的背景为（）。每个项目的文本标签都可以使用其自己的字体和笔刷呈现。这些是使用setFont（）和setForeground（）函数指定的，并使用font（）和前台（）读取。

trans-unit.source: Each item has a number of data elements associated with it and they can be retrieved by specifying a role (see Qt::ItemDataRole) to the model's data() function. Data for all available roles can be obtained at the same time using the itemData() function.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有许多与之关联的数据元素，可以通过为模型的data（）函数指定一个角色（请参见Qt :: ItemDataRole）来检索它们。使用itemData（）函数可以同时获取所有可用角色的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each item has an itemText(), an optional itemIcon(), an optional itemToolTip(), and a widget(). The item's attributes can be changed with setItemText(), setItemIcon(), and setItemToolTip(). Each item can be enabled or disabled individually with setItemEnabled().
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有一个itemText（），一个可选的itemIcon（），一个可选的itemToolTip（）和一个小部件（）。可以使用setItemText（），setItemIcon（）和setItemToolTip（）更改项目的属性。可以使用setItemEnabled（）分别启用或禁用每个项目。

trans-unit.source: Each item in a list can display a text label and an icon. The colors and font used to render the text can be changed to provide a customized appearance for items. Tooltips, status tips, and "What's This?" help are all easily configured to ensure that the list is properly integrated into the application.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个项目可以显示一个文本标签和一个图标。用于渲染文本的颜色和字体可以改变,以提供项目的自定义外观。工具提示、状态提示和 "这是什么?"帮助都可以轻松配置,以确保列表正确地集成到应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the
trans-unit.target: 中的每个项目

trans-unit.source: Each item in the list has attached properties named ListView.section, ListView.previousSection and ListView.nextSection.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个项目都具有名为 ListView.section ， ListView.previousSection 和 ListView.nextSection 的附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the model has a set of data elements associated with it, each with its own role. The roles are used by the view to indicate to the model which type of data it needs. Custom models should return data in these types.
trans-unit.target: 模型中的每个项目都有一组与之相关的数据元素,每个元素都有自己的作用。角色被视图用来向模型指示它需要哪种类型的数据。自定义模型应该返回这些类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each item written to the stream is written in a predefined binary format that varies depending on the item's type. Supported Qt types include QBrush, QColor, QDateTime, QFont, QPixmap, QString, QVariant and many others. For the complete list of all Qt types supporting data streaming see Serializing Qt Data Types.

Each item written to the stream is written in a predefined binary format that varies depending on the item's type. Supported Qt types include QBrush, QColor, QDateTime, QFont, QPixmap, QString, QVariant and many others. For the complete list of all Qt types supporting data streaming see Serializing Qt Data Types.
trans-unit.target: 写入流的每个项目均以预定义的二进制格式写入，该格式根据项目的类型而有所不同。支持Qt的类型包括QBrush，而QColor，QDateTime，QFont，QPixmap的，QString的，的QVariant和其他许多人。有关支持数据流的所有Qt类型的完整列表，请参见序列化Qt数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Each item's flags can be changed by calling setFlags() with the appropriate value (see Qt::ItemFlags). Checkable items can be checked, unchecked and partially checked with the setCheckState() function. The corresponding checkState() function indicates the item's current check state.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用具有适当值的setFlags（）来更改每个项目的标志（请参见Qt :: ItemFlags）。可以使用setCheckState（）函数对可检查项进行检查，取消检查和部分检查。相应的checkState（）函数指示项目的当前检查状态。

trans-unit.source: Each language which supports handwriting recognition must provide a special keyboard layout named
trans-unit.target: 每种支持手写识别的语言都必须提供一个特殊的键盘布局,名为

trans-unit.source: Each layer represents a flag that can be OR'ed together when calling functions such as invalidate() or QGraphicsView::invalidateScene().
trans-unit.target: 每一层都代表一个标志，当调用诸如invalidate（）或QGraphicsView :: invalidateScene（）之类的函数时，这些标志可以进行或运算。

trans-unit.source: Each layout defines its own API for arranging widgets and layout items. For example, with a grid layout, you require a row and a column index with optional row and column spans, alignment, spacing, and more. A linear layout, however, requires a single row or column index to position its items. For a grid layout, the order of insertion does not affect the layout in any way, but for a linear layout, the order is essential. When writing your own layout subclass, you are free to choose the API that best suits your layout.
trans-unit.target: 每种布局都定义了自己的API,用于安排部件和布局项目。例如,对于网格布局,您需要一个行和一个列索引,以及可选的行和列跨度、对齐方式、间距等。而线性布局则需要一个单一的行或列索引来定位其项目。对于网格布局来说,插入的顺序对布局没有任何影响,但对于线性布局来说,顺序是必不可少的。在编写自己的布局子类时,可以自由选择最适合自己布局的API。

trans-unit.source: Each line from the qdocconf file is first quoted. Below each statement you will find the meaning.
trans-unit.target: qdocconf文件中的每一行都先被引用。在每条语句的下面,你会发现其含义。

trans-unit.source: Each minor release of Qt supports a known-good Emscripten version. That Emscripten version will be supported for the lifetime of that Qt version.
Each minor tickmark displayed by the gauge.
trans-unit.target: 仪表所显示的每个小刻度线。

trans-unit.source: Each module in Qt 5 has a library target with the naming convention Qt5::<Module> which can be used for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: Qt 5中的每个模块都有一个带有命名约定Qt5 :: <Module>的库目标，可用于此目的。

trans-unit.source: Each name filter is a wildcard (globbing) filter that understands * and ? wildcards. See QRegularExpression Wildcard Matching.
trans-unit.target: 每个名称过滤器都是通配符（通配符）过滤器，可理解 * 和 ? 通配符。请参阅QRegularExpression通配符匹配。

trans-unit.source: Each named value can be referred to as <Type>.<value>. For example, the Text type has an AlignRight enumeration value:
trans-unit.target: 每个命名值都可以称为 <Type>.<value> 。例如，Text类型具有 AlignRight 枚举值：

trans-unit.source: Each network interface can contain zero or more IP addresses, which in turn can be associated with a netmask and/or a broadcast address (depending on support from the operating system).
trans-unit.target: 每个网络接口可以包含零个或多个IP地址,而这些IP地址又可以与一个网罩和/或广播地址相关联(取决于操作系统的支持)。

trans-unit.source: Each newly added item undergoes an add transition, but before the transition can finish, another item is added, displacing the previously added item. Because of this, the add transition on the previously added item is interrupted and a displaced transition is started on the item instead. Due to the interruption, the opacity and scale animations have not completed, thus producing items with opacity and scale that are below 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 每个新添加的项目都经历了 add 过渡，但是在过渡完成之前，将添加另一个项目，以替换先前添加的项目。因此，先前添加的项目上的 add 过渡被中断，并且 displaced 的项目开始在该项目上开始过渡。由于中断， opacity 和 scale 动画没有完成，因此产生的不透明度和比例低于1.0的项目。

trans-unit.source: Each node in the framegraph defines a part of the configuration the renderer will use to render the scene. The position of a node in the framegraph tree determines when and where the subtree rooted at that node will be the active configuration in the rendering pipeline. As we will see later, the renderer traverses this tree in order to build up the state needed for your rendering algorithm at each point in the frame.
trans-unit.target: 框架图中的每个节点都定义了渲染器将用于渲染场景的配置的一部分。一个节点在framegraph树中的位置决定了根植于该节点的子树何时何地将成为渲染管道中的活动配置。正如我们稍后将看到的那样,渲染器遍历这棵树,以便在帧中的每个点建立你的渲染算法所需的状态。

trans-unit.source: Each object on a form can be selected by clicking on the corresponding item in the Object Inspector. Right-clicking opens the form's context menu. These features can be useful if you have many overlapping objects. To locate an object in the Object Inspector, use Ctrl+F.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在“ 对象检查器”中单击相应的项目来选择表单上的每个对象。右键单击可打开表单的上下文菜单。如果您有许多重叠的对象，这些功能将很有用。要查找的对象Object Inspector中，使用Ctrl + F键。

trans-unit.source: Each of the above functions has a blocking variant that returns the final result instead of a QFuture. You use them in the same way as the asynchronous variants.
trans-unit.target: 上述每个函数都有一个阻塞变量，该变量返回最终结果而不是QFuture。您以与异步变量相同的方式使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Each of the above functions has a variant that takes an iterator range instead of a sequence. You use them in the same way as the sequence variants:
trans-unit.target: 上面的每个函数都有一个变体,它取一个迭代器范围而不是序列。你可以用与序列变体相同的方式使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Each of the above functions have a blocking variant that returns the final result instead of a QFuture. You use them in the same way as the asynchronous variants.
trans-unit.target: 以上每个函数都有一个阻塞变量，该变量返回最终结果而不是QFuture。您以与异步变量相同的方式使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Each of the twelve months corresponds with a zodiac sign. The first six months have 31 days, the next five have 30 days, and the last month has 29 days in usual years but 30 days in leap years. The New Year's Day always falls on the March equinox.

Each of the types of item used with QListWidget, QTableWidget, and QTreeWidget is configured to use a different set of flags by default. For example, each QListWidgetItem or QTreeWidgetItem is initially enabled, checkable, selectable, and can be used as the source of a drag and drop operation; each QTableWidgetItem can also be edited and used as the target of a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，与QListWidget，QTableWidget和QTreeWidget一起使用的每种项目类型都配置为使用不同的标志集。例如，每个QListWidgetItem或QTreeWidgetItem最初都是启用，可检查，可选的，并且可用作拖放操作的源；每个QTableWidgetItem也可以进行编辑，并用作拖放操作的目标。

trans-unit.source: Each of these motion mechanisms is different, and different types of widgets receive focus in only some of them. We'll cover each of them in turn.
trans-unit.target: 这些运动机制中的每一个都是不同的,不同类型的小部件只在其中一些中获得焦点。我们将逐一介绍它们。

trans-unit.source: Each of these values will be stored in a texture. The normal, color, depth, and position textures form what is called the G-Buffer. Nothing is drawn onscreen during the first pass, but rather drawn into the G-Buffer ready for later use.
trans-unit.target: 每一个值都会被存储在一个纹理中。法线、颜色、深度和位置纹理构成了所谓的G-Buffer。在第一个通道中,屏幕上没有任何东西被绘制,而是被绘制到G-Buffer中,以备以后使用。

trans-unit.source: Each output range specifies a minimum and maximum value as well as an accuracy value. The accuracy value represents the resolution of the sensor. It is the smallest change the sensor can detect and is expressed using the same units as the minimum and maximum.
trans-unit.target: 每个输出范围都指定了一个最小值和最大值以及一个精度值。精度值代表传感器的分辨率。它是传感器可以检测到的最小变化,并使用与最小值和最大值相同的单位表示。

trans-unit.source: Each page listed on this group page contains the command:
trans-unit.target: 该组页面上列出的每个页面都包含命令。

trans-unit.source: Each pixel stored in a QImage is represented by an integer. The size of the integer varies depending on the format. QImage supports several image formats described by the Format enum.
trans-unit.target: QImage中存储的每个像素都由整数表示。整数的大小取决于格式。QImage支持Format枚举描述的几种图像格式。

trans-unit.source: Each pixel stored in a QImage is represented by an integer. The size of the integer varies depending on the format. QImage supports several image formats described by the Format enum.

Each place is assigned zero or more categories. Categories are typically used when searching for a particular kind of place, such as a restaurant or hotel. Some places have a ratings object, which gives an indication of the quality of the place.
trans-unit.target: 每个地方被分配零个或多个类别。在搜索特定种类的场所（例如餐厅或酒店）时，通常使用类别。有些地方有一个评级对象，它可以指示地方的质量。

trans-unit.source: Each point in a polygon can be retrieved by passing its index to the point() function. To populate the polygon, QPolygon provides the setPoint() function to set the point at a given index, the setPoints() function to set all the points in the polygon (resizing it to the given number of points), and the putPoints() function which copies a number of given points into the polygon from a specified index (resizing the polygon if necessary).
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将其索引传递给point（）函数来检索多边形中的每个点。为了填充多边形，QPolygon提供了setPoint（）函数来将点设置为给定索引，setPoints（）函数来设置多边形中的所有点（将其调整为给定的点数），以及putPoints（）该函数从指定的索引将多个给定点复制到多边形中（必要时调整多边形的大小）。

trans-unit.source: Each point in a polygon can be retrieved by passing its index to the point() function. To populate the polygon, QPolygon provides the setPoint() function to set the point at a given index, the setPoints() function to set all the points in the polygon (resizing it to the given number of points), and the putPoints() function which copies a number of given points into the polygon from a specified index (resizing the polygon if necessary).

trans-unit.source: Each process that participates in QtRO's IPC will instantiate a Node-based type (QRemoteObjectNode, QRemoteObjectHost, or QRemoteObjectRegistryHost). The host types of Nodes provide additional functionality. Both QRemoteObjectHost and QRemoteObjectRegistryHost support the enableRemoting() (and the corresponding disableRemoting()) methods, which are the key methods to expose Source objects to the network. In order to use the Registry functionality, there should be a QRemoteObjectRegistryHost on the network. All other nodes can then pass the RegistryHost's URL to the Node's
trans-unit.target: 参与QtRO IPC的每个进程都将实例化基于节点的类型（QRemoteObjectNode，QRemoteObjectHost或QRemoteObjectRegistryHost）。节点的主机类型提供其他功能。既QRemoteObjectHost和QRemoteObjectRegistryHost支持enableRemoting（） （和相应的disableRemoting（） ）的方法，其是，以暴露键方法来源对象到网络。为了使用注册表功能，网络上应该有一个QRemoteObjectRegistryHost。然后，所有其他节点可以将RegistryHost的URL传递到该节点的

trans-unit.source: Each process that participates in the network instantiates a Node-based type, such as QRemoteObjectNode, QRemoteObjectHost, or QRemoteObjectRegistryHost. The host types of Nodes provide additional functionality. Both QRemoteObjectHost and QRemoteObjectRegistryHost support the enableRemoting() and the corresponding disableRemoting()) methods, which are the key methods to expose source objects to the network. To use the Registry functionality, you need to have a QRemoteObjectRegistryHost on the network. Then, all other nodes can pass the RegistryHost's URL to the Node's registryAddress constructor parameter, or pass the URL to the setRegistryUrl() method.

trans-unit.source: Each qdoc comment must have a
trans-unit.target: 每个qdoc评论必须有一个

trans-unit.source: Each range object in the list has the minimumFrameRate and maximumFrameRate properties.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个范围的对象具有 minimumFrameRate 和 maximumFrameRate 性质。

trans-unit.source: Each result is a QRegularExpressionMatch object holding all the information for that result (including captured substrings).
trans-unit.target: 每个结果都是一个QRegularExpressionMatch对象，该对象保存该结果的所有信息（包括捕获的子字符串）。

trans-unit.source: Each scroll bar has a value that indicates how far the slider is from the start of the scroll bar; this is obtained with value() and set with setValue(). This value always lies within the range of values defined for the scroll bar, from minimum() to maximum() inclusive. The range of acceptable values can be set with setMinimum() and setMaximum(). At the minimum value, the top edge of the slider (for a vertical scroll bar) or left edge (for a horizontal scroll bar) will be at the top (or left) end of the scroll bar. At the maximum value, the bottom (or right) edge of the slider will be at the bottom (or right) end of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 每个滚动条都有一个值，该值指示滑块距滚动条起点的距离。这是通过value（）获得的，并通过setValue（）进行设置的。此值始终在为滚动条定义的值的范围内，从minimum（）到maximum（）（包括两端）。可以使用setMinimum（）和setMaximum（）设置可接受值的范围。在最小值时，滑块的顶部边缘（对于垂直滚动条）或左边缘（对于水平滚动条）将在滚动条的顶部（或左侧）。在最大值时，滑块的底部（或右侧）边缘将位于滚动条的底部（或右侧）末端。

trans-unit.source: Each section is a logical unit in the document. The section heading appears in the automatically generated table of contents that normally appears in the upper right-hand corner of the page.
trans-unit.target: 每一节是文档中的一个逻辑单元。节标题出现在自动生成的目录中,通常出现在页面的右上角。

trans-unit.source: Each section of a header is described by a section ID, specified by its section(), and can be located at a particular visualIndex() in the header. A section can have a sort indicator set with setSortIndicator(); this indicates whether the items in the associated item view will be sorted in the order given by the section.
trans-unit.target: 标题的每个部分都由一个部分ID来描述，该ID由它的section（）指定，并且可以位于标题中的特定visualIndex（）处。一个节可以使用setSortIndicator（）设置排序指示器；这表明相关项目视图中的项目是否将按照该部分给出的顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each series can be bound to one or more horizontal and vertical axes, but mixing axis types that would result in different domains is not supported, such as specifying QValueAxis and QLogValueAxis on the same orientation.
trans-unit.target: 每个系列都可以绑定到一个或多个水平轴和垂直轴，但是不支持混合使用会导致不同域的轴类型，例如在相同方向上指定QValueAxis和QLogValueAxis。

trans-unit.source: Each series can be bound to only one horizontal and vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 每个系列只能绑定一个水平轴和垂直轴。

trans-unit.source: Each service instance represents an <invoke> element in the SCXML document. Each time the service is actually invoked, a new instance of QScxmlInvokableService is created.
trans-unit.target: 每个服务实例代表SCXML文档中的 <invoke> 元素。每次实际调用服务时，都会创建一个新的QScxmlInvokableService实例。

trans-unit.source: Each service provider must follow a naming convention for their service specific parameter names/keys. They use the provider name as prefix for all their parameter names. For example, the HERE service provider requires the here.app_id parameter. When a provider is loaded only those parameters are passed on whose parameter names start with the provider name. This avoids the sharing sensitive parameters such as confidential token or app_id parameters with other plugins.

Each service provider must follow a naming convention for their service specific parameter names/keys. They use the provider name as prefix for all their parameter names. For example, the HERE service provider requires the here.app_id parameter. When a provider is loaded only those parameters are passed on whose parameter names start with the provider name. This avoids the sharing sensitive parameters such as confidential token or app_id parameters with other plugins.
trans-unit.target: 每个服务提供者必须遵循其服务特定参数名称/键的命名约定。他们使用提供程序名称作为其所有参数名称的前缀。例如，HERE服务提供商需要 here.app_id 参数。加载提供程序时，仅传递其参数名称以提供程序名称开头的那些参数。这样可以避免与其他插件共享敏感参数，例如机密 token 或 app_id 参数。

trans-unit.source: Each setting for this property has pros and cons.
Each state should have a unique name within its item.
trans-unit.target: 每个状态都应该在其项目内有一个独特的名称。

trans-unit.source: Each status indicator falls into one of three categories:
trans-unit.target: 每个状态指标可分为三类:

trans-unit.source: Each style provides a color - that is, QBrush - palette that should be used for drawing the widgets. There is one set of colors for the different widget states (QPalette::ColorGroup): active (widgets in the window that have keyboard focus), inactive (widgets used for other windows), and disabled (widgets that are disabled). The states can be found by querying the State_Active and State_Enabled state flags. Each set contains certain color roles given by the QPalette::ColorRole enum. The roles describe in which situations the colors should be used (e.g., for painting widget backgrounds, text, or buttons).
trans-unit.target: 每种样式都提供一种颜色（即QBrush）调色板，该调色板应用于绘制窗口小部件。对于不同的窗口小部件状态（QPalette :: ColorGroup）有一组颜色：激活（窗口中具有键盘焦点的窗口小部件），不激活（用于其他窗口的窗口小部件）和禁用（窗口小部件被禁用）。可以通过查询 State_Active 和 State_Enabled 状态标志来找到状态。每个集合包含QPalette :: ColorRole枚举给定的某些颜色角色。角色描述了在哪种情况下应使用颜色（例如，绘制小部件背景，文本或按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Each subclass should provide a reimplementation of the destructor to ensure that any private data is automatically cleaned up when user data objects are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 每个子类都应该提供一个重新实现的析构器,以确保当用户数据对象被删除时,任何私有数据都会被自动清理。

trans-unit.source: Each tab can display text in a distinct color. The current text color for a tab can be found with the tabTextColor() function. Set the text color for a particular tab with setTabTextColor().
trans-unit.target: 每个选项卡可以用不同的颜色显示文本。标签的当前文本颜色可以通过tabTextColor（）函数找到。使用setTabTextColor（）设置特定选项卡的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: Each tab definition is represented by this struct.
trans-unit.target: 每个标签的定义都由这个结构来表示。

trans-unit.source: Each tab has a tabText(), an optional tabIcon(), an optional tabToolTip(), optional tabWhatsThis() and optional tabData(). The tabs's attributes can be changed with setTabText(), setTabIcon(), setTabToolTip(), setTabWhatsThis and setTabData(). Each tabs can be enabled or disabled individually with setTabEnabled().
trans-unit.target: 每个选项卡都有一个tabText（），一个可选的tabIcon（），一个可选的tabToolTip（），可选的tabWhatsThis（）和可选的tabData（）。选项卡的属性可以通过setTabText（），setTabIcon（），setTabToolTip（），setTabWhatsThis和setTabData（）进行更改。每个选项卡都可以使用setTabEnabled（）单独启用或禁用。

trans-unit.source: Each tab is either enabled or disabled at any given time (see setTabEnabled()). If a tab is enabled, the tab text is drawn normally and the user can select that tab. If it is disabled, the tab is drawn in a different way and the user cannot select that tab. Note that even if a tab is disabled, the page can still be visible, for example if all of the tabs happen to be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 每个选项卡在任何给定时间都是启用或禁用的（请参阅setTabEnabled（））。如果启用了选项卡，则将正常绘制选项卡文本，并且用户可以选择该选项卡。如果禁用该选项卡，则该选项卡将以其他方式绘制，并且用户无法选择该选项卡。请注意，即使某个选项卡被禁用，该页面仍然可见，例如，如果所有选项卡都被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Each table entry shows the number of links from QtCore to some other module, except for the last entry, which shows the number of broken links in QtCore. Click the qtquick entry to load the QA subpage showing the links from QtCore to QtQuick.
trans-unit.target: 每个表条目均显示从QtCore到其他模块的链接数，最后一个条目除外，后者显示QtCore中断开的链接数。单击qtquick条目以加载QA子页面，该页面显示了从QtCore到QtQuick的链接。

trans-unit.source: Each table entry shows the number of links from QtCore to some other module, except for the last entry, which shows the number of broken links in QtCore. Click the qtquick entry to load the QA subpage showing the links from QtCore to QtQuick.

Each text block is located at a specific position() in a document(). The contents of the block can be obtained by using the text() function. The length() function determines the block's size within the document (including formatting characters). The visual properties of the block are determined by its text layout(), its charFormat(), and its blockFormat().
trans-unit.target: 每个文本块位于一个特定位置一个在（）文件（）。可以使用text（）函数获得该块的内容。的长度（）函数确定文档（包括格式化字符）中的块的大小。块的视觉属性由其文本布局（），其charFormat（）和其blockFormat（）确定。

trans-unit.source: Each thread can have its own event loop. The initial thread starts its event loop using QCoreApplication::exec(), or for single-dialog GUI applications, sometimes QDialog::exec(). Other threads can start an event loop using QThread::exec(). Like QCoreApplication, QThread provides an exit(int) function and a quit() slot.
trans-unit.target: 每个线程可以有自己的事件循环。初始线程使用QCoreApplication :: exec（）或对于单对话框GUI应用程序（有时是QDialog :: exec（））启动其事件循环。其他线程可以使用QThread :: exec（）启动事件循环。与QCoreApplication一样，QThread提供了一个退出（int）函数和一个quit（）插槽。

trans-unit.source: Each tickmark displayed by the gauge.
trans-unit.target: 仪表所显示的每个刻度线。

trans-unit.source: Each time such an event occurs the parser reports it; you can set up event handlers to respond to these events.
trans-unit.target: 每次发生这样的事件时,解析器都会报告;你可以设置事件处理程序来响应这些事件。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call insert(), you can specify a cost as third argument (after the key and a pointer to the object to insert). After the call, the inserted object is owned by the QCache, which may delete it at any time to make room for other objects.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用insert（）时，您都可以将成本指定为第三个参数（在要插入的对象的键和指针之后）。调用之后，插入的对象归QCache所有，QCache可以随时将其删除以为其他对象腾出空间。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call insert(), you can specify a cost as third argument (after the key and a pointer to the object to insert). After the call, the inserted object is owned by the QCache, which may delete it at any time to make room for other objects.
Each time you update the project file, you need to run qmake to generate an updated Visual Studio project.
trans-unit.target: 每次更新项目文件时,你都需要运行qmake来生成一个更新的Visual Studio项目。

trans-unit.source: Each touch point within a MultiPointTouchArea will have a unique id.
trans-unit.target: MultiPointTouchArea中的每个接触点将具有唯一的ID。

trans-unit.source: Each two adjacent elements in the path are intended to be connected together by the shortest line segment of constant bearing passing through both elements. This type of connection can cross the dateline in the longitudinal direction, but never crosses the poles.
trans-unit.target: 路径中每两个相邻的元素都要通过穿过这两个元素的最短的恒定轴承线段连接在一起。这种连接方式可以在纵向上跨越数据线,但决不跨越两极。

trans-unit.source: Each two adjacent elements in this list are intended to be connected together by the shortest line segment of constant bearing passing through both elements. This type of connection can cross the date line in the longitudinal direction, but never crosses the poles.
trans-unit.target: 本列表中每两个相邻的元素都要用通过两个元素的最短的恒定轴承线段连接在一起。这种连接方式可以在纵向上跨越日期线,但决不跨越两极。

trans-unit.source: Each type of button has its own specific use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of button, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的按钮都有其特定的使用案例。下面的章节提供了根据用例选择适当类型的按钮的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of container can be used to group a set of controls together. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of container, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的容器都可用于将一组控件组合在一起。以下各节提供了根据用例选择适当类型容器的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of delegate has its own specific target use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of delegate, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的委托都有其特定的目标用例。以下各节提供了根据用例选择适当类型的委托的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of indicator has its own specific target use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of indicator, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的指标都有其特定的目标用例。以下各节提供了根据用例选择适当类型指标的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of input control has its own specific target use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of input control, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的输入控制都有其特定的目标用例。以下各节提供了根据用例选择适当类型的输入控制的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of menu control has its own specific target use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of menu control, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的菜单控件都有其特定的目标用例。以下各节提供了根据用例选择适当类型的菜单控件的指南。

trans-unit.source: Each type of popup control has its own specific target use case. The following sections offer guidelines for choosing the appropriate type of popup control, depending on the use case.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的弹出式控件都有其特定的目标用例。以下部分提供了根据用例选择适当类型的弹出式控件的指导。

trans-unit.source: Each vertex in a skinned mesh is associated (bound) to up to 4 joints in a skeleton. For each joint affecting a vertex the mesh also provides a weight which determines the level of influence of the corresponding joint. The skinning palette used for performing the transformation of skinned vertices is provided by the Armature and is calculated from the joints contained in the referenced skeleton.
trans-unit.target: 蒙皮网格中的每个顶点都与骨架中的4个关节相关联(绑定)。对于每个影响顶点的关节,网格还提供了一个权重,它决定了相应关节的影响程度。用于执行换肤顶点转换的换肤调色板是由衔铁提供的,并从参考骨架中包含的关节计算而来。

trans-unit.source: Each web engine history item represents an entry in the history stack of a web page, containing information about the page, its location, and the time when it was last visited.
trans-unit.target: 每一个网络引擎历史记录项都代表了网页历史堆栈中的一个条目,其中包含了有关网页的信息,它的位置,以及最后一次被访问的时间。

trans-unit.source: Each web engine page contains a history of visited pages that can be accessed by QWebEnginePage::history().
trans-unit.target: 每个Web引擎页面均包含可通过QWebEnginePage :: history（）访问的访问页面的历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Each web engine view can have individual settings that can be accessed by using the WebEngineView.settings property.
trans-unit.target: 每个Web引擎视图都可以具有单独的设置，可以使用WebEngineView.settings属性来访问这些设置。

trans-unit.source: Each web engine view has an associated profile. Views that do not have a specific profile set share a common default one.
trans-unit.target: 每个网络引擎视图都有一个相关的配置文件。没有设置特定配置文件的视图共享一个共同的默认配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Each widget performs all painting operations from within its paintEvent() function. This is called whenever the widget needs to be redrawn, either as a result of some external change or when requested by the application.
trans-unit.target: 每个小部件都从其paintEvent（）函数内执行所有绘制操作。每当由于外部更改或应用程序要求而需要重新绘制窗口小部件时，都将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Easing curves define how the animation will interpolate between the start value and the end value. Different easing curves might go beyond the defined range of interpolation. The easing curves simplify the creation of animation effects such as bounce effects, acceleration, deceleration, and cyclical animations.
trans-unit.target: 缓和曲线定义了动画在开始值和结束值之间的插值方式。不同的缓和曲线可能会超出定义的插值范围。缓和曲线简化了动画效果的创建,如弹跳效果、加速、减速和循环动画。

trans-unit.source: Easing curves describe a function that controls how the speed of the interpolation between 0 and 1 should be. Easing curves allow transitions from one value to another to appear more natural than a simple constant speed would allow. The QEasingCurve class is usually used in conjunction with the QVariantAnimation and QPropertyAnimation classes but can be used on its own. It is usually used to accelerate the interpolation from zero velocity (ease in) or decelerate to zero velocity (ease out). Ease in and ease out can also be combined in the same easing curve.
trans-unit.target: 缓和曲线描述了一个函数，该函数控制0和1之间的插值速度应如何。缓和曲线允许从一个值到另一个值的过渡看起来比简单的恒定速度所允许的过渡更为自然。该QEasingCurve类通常在与配合使用QVariantAnimation和QPropertyAnimation类，但可以对自己使用。通常用于将插值从零速度加速（减小）或减速到零速度（减小）。缓入和缓出也可以组合在同一缓动曲线中。

trans-unit.source: Easing curves describe a function that controls how the speed of the interpolation between 0 and 1 should be. Easing curves allow transitions from one value to another to appear more natural than a simple constant speed would allow. The QEasingCurve class is usually used in conjunction with the QVariantAnimation and QPropertyAnimation classes but can be used on its own. It is usually used to accelerate the interpolation from zero velocity (ease in) or decelerate to zero velocity (ease out). Ease in and ease out can also be combined in the same easing curve.
Easing curves for controlling animation
trans-unit.target: 用于控制动画的缓和曲线

trans-unit.source: Editors are created with a QItemEditorFactory; a default static instance provided by QItemEditorFactory is installed on all item delegates. You can set a custom factory using setItemEditorFactory() or set a new default factory with QItemEditorFactory::setDefaultFactory(). It is the data stored in the item model with the EditRole that is edited. See the QItemEditorFactory class for a more high-level introduction to item editor factories. The Color Editor Factory example shows how to create custom editors with a factory.
trans-unit.target: 使用QItemEditorFactory创建编辑器；由QItemEditorFactory提供的默认静态实例安装在所有项目委托上。您可以使用setItemEditorFactory（）设置自定义工厂，也可以使用QItemEditorFactory :: setDefaultFactory（）设置新的默认工厂。这是记录在项目模型与数据EditRole被编辑。有关项目编辑器工厂的更高级介绍，请参见QItemEditorFactory类。在颜色编辑器厂的示例演示如何创建自定义编辑器有一个工厂。

trans-unit.source: Editors are created with a QItemEditorFactory; a default static instance provided by QItemEditorFactory is installed on all item delegates. You can set a custom factory using setItemEditorFactory() or set a new default factory with QItemEditorFactory::setDefaultFactory(). It is the data stored in the item model with the EditRole that is edited. See the QItemEditorFactory class for a more high-level introduction to item editor factories. The Color Editor Factory example shows how to create custom editors with a factory.

trans-unit.source: Effect creates perceived impression that the source item appears to be moving in the direction of the blur. Blur is applied to both sides of each pixel, therefore setting the direction to 0 and 180 provides the same result.

trans-unit.source: Effect creates perceived impression that the source item appears to be moving towards the center point in Z-direction or that the camera appears to be zooming rapidly. Other available motion blur effects are DirectionalBlur and RadialBlur.
trans-unit.target: 效果会产生一种印象，即源项目似乎正朝Z方向向中心点移动，或者相机似乎正在迅速缩放。其他可用的运动模糊效果是DirectionalBlur和RadialBlur。

trans-unit.source: Effect creates perceived impression that the source item appears to be rotating to the direction of the blur.
trans-unit.target: 该效果使人感觉到源物品似乎在向模糊的方向旋转。

trans-unit.source: Effects alter the appearance of elements by hooking into the rendering pipeline and operating between the source (e.g., a QGraphicsPixmapItem) and the destination device (e.g., QGraphicsView's viewport). Effects can be disabled by calling setEnabled(false). If effects are disabled, the source is rendered directly.
trans-unit.target: 效果通过挂接到渲染管道并在源（例如QGraphicsPixmapItem）和目标设备（例如QGraphicsView的视口）之间进行操作来更改元素的外观。可以通过调用setEnabled（false）禁用效果。如果禁用效果，则直接渲染源。

trans-unit.source: Element attributes are represented by QDomAttr objects that can be queried using the attribute() and attributeNode() functions. You can set attributes with the setAttribute() and setAttributeNode() functions. Attributes can be removed with removeAttribute(). There are namespace-aware equivalents to these functions, i.e. setAttributeNS(), setAttributeNodeNS() and removeAttributeNS().
trans-unit.target: 元素属性由QDomAttr对象表示，可以使用attribute（）和attributeNode（）函数进行查询。您可以使用setAttribute（）和setAttributeNode（）函数设置属性。可以使用removeAttribute（）删除属性。这些功能有名称空间感知的等效项，即setAttributeNS（），setAttributeNodeNS（）和removeAttributeNS（）。

trans-unit.source: Element content comprises characters, entity references or nested elements. Content can be written with writeCharacters(), a function that also takes care of escaping all forbidden characters and character sequences, writeEntityReference(), or subsequent calls to writeStartElement().
trans-unit.target: 元素内容包括字符，实体引用或嵌套元素。内容可以使用writeCharacters（）编写，该函数还负责转义所有禁止的字符和字符序列，writeEntityReference（）或后续对writeStartElement（）的调用。

trans-unit.source: Element content consists of either characters, entity references or nested elements. It is written with writeCharacters(), which also takes care of escaping all forbidden characters and character sequences, writeEntityReference(), or subsequent calls to writeStartElement(). A convenience method writeTextElement() can be used for writing terminal elements that contain nothing but text.
trans-unit.target: 元素内容由字符，实体引用或嵌套元素组成。它是使用writeCharacters（）编写的，它还负责转义所有禁止的字符和字符序列，writeEntityReference（）或后续对writeStartElement（）的调用。方便的方法writeTextElement（）可用于编写仅包含文本的终端元素。

trans-unit.source: Element names without a prefix belong to the default namespace. This rule does not apply to attributes: an attribute without a prefix does not belong to any of the declared XML namespaces at all. Attributes always belong to the "traditional" namespace of the element in which they appear. A "traditional" namespace is not an XML namespace, it simply means that all attribute names belonging to one element must be different. Later we will see how to assign an XML namespace to an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 没有前缀的元素名属于默认的命名空间。这条规则不适用于属性:没有前缀的属性根本不属于任何声明的 XML 命名空间。属性总是属于它们出现的元素的 "传统 "命名空间。传统的 "命名空间并不是XML命名空间,它只是意味着属于一个元素的所有属性名必须是不同的。稍后我们将看到如何为一个属性分配一个XML命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Element tags are opened with writeStartElement() followed by writeAttribute() or writeAttributes(), element content, and then writeEndElement(). A shorter form writeEmptyElement() can be used to write empty elements, followed by writeAttributes().
trans-unit.target: 元素标签的打开方式是writeStartElement（），然后是writeAttribute（）或writeAttributes（），元素内容，然后是writeEndElement（）。较短的形式writeEmptyElement（）可用于写入空元素，其后是writeAttributes（）。

trans-unit.source: Elements of the file's name can be extracted with path() and fileName(). The fileName()'s parts can be extracted with baseName(), suffix() or completeSuffix(). QFileInfo objects to directories created by Qt classes will not have a trailing file separator. If you wish to use trailing separators in your own file info objects, just append one to the file name given to the constructors or setFile().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用path（）和fileName（）提取文件名的元素。的文件名（）的部件都可以用被提取baseName的（），后缀（）或completeSuffix（）。由Qt类创建的目录的QFileInfo对象将没有尾随文件分隔符。如果您希望在自己的文件信息对象中使用尾随分隔符，只需在给构造函数或setFile（）的文件名后附加一个。

trans-unit.source: Elements of the file's name can be extracted with path() and fileName(). The fileName()'s parts can be extracted with baseName(), suffix() or completeSuffix(). QFileInfo objects to directories created by Qt classes will not have a trailing file separator. If you wish to use trailing separators in your own file info objects, just append one to the file name given to the constructors or setFile().

Elements which are invisible because they are a child of a non-visible element (for example, the second tab in a tab-widget, while the first tab is shown) should be initialized lazily in most cases, and deleted when no longer in use, to avoid the ongoing cost of leaving them active (for example, rendering, animations, property binding evaluation, etc).
trans-unit.target: 因为是不可见元素的子元素而不可见的元素(例如,tab-widget中的第二个tab,而第一个tab是显示的)在大多数情况下应该被懒惰地初始化,并在不再使用时被删除,以避免让它们处于活动状态的持续成本(例如,渲染、动画、属性绑定评估等)。

trans-unit.source: Elements which can group together other document elements are typically subclasses of QTextObject, and fall into two categories: Elements that group together text blocks are subclasses of QTextBlockGroup, and those that group together frames and other elements are subclasses of QTextFrame.

trans-unit.source: Enables compositing.

Enables compression of certain frequent events. On the X11 windowing system, the default value is true, which means that QEvent::MouseMove, QEvent::TouchUpdate, and changes in window size and position will be combined whenever they occur more frequently than the application handles them, so that they don't accumulate and overwhelm the application later. On Windows 8 and above the default value is also true, but it only applies to touch events. Mouse and window events remain unaffected by this flag. On other platforms, the default is false. (In the future, the compression feature may be implemented across platforms.) You can test the attribute to see whether compression is enabled. If your application needs to handle all events with no compression, you can unset this attribute. Notice that input events from tablet devices will not be compressed. See AA_CompressTabletEvents if you want these to be compressed as well. This value was added in Qt 5.7.
trans-unit.target: 启用某些频繁事件的压缩。在X11窗口系统上，默认值为true，这意味着QEvent :: MouseMove，QEvent :: TouchUpdate，并且窗口大小和位置的更改将在它们发生的频率大于应用程序处理它们的频率时组合在一起，以便它们不会在以后积累和淹没应用程序。在Windows 8及更高版本上，默认值也为true，但它仅适用于触摸事件。鼠标和窗口事件不受此标志的影响。在其他平台上，默认值为false。 （将来，压缩功能可能会在各个平台上实现。）您可以测试属性以查看是否启用了压缩。如果您的应用程序需要在不压缩的情况下处理所有事件，则可以取消设置此属性。请注意，来自平板电脑设备的输入事件将不会被压缩。如果还希望压缩它们，请参见AA_CompressTabletEvents。这个值是在Qt 5.7中添加的。

trans-unit.source: Enables compression of input events from tablet devices. Notice that AA_CompressHighFrequencyEvents must be true for events compression to be enabled, and that this flag extends the former to tablet events. Currently supported on the X11 windowing system, Windows 8 and above. The default value is false. This value was added in Qt 5.10.
trans-unit.target: 启用对来自平板电脑设备的输入事件进行压缩。注意,AA_CompressHighFrequencyEvents必须为true才能启用事件压缩,该标志将前者扩展到平板电脑事件。目前支持X11窗口系统,Windows 8及以上版本。默认值为false。这个值是在Qt 5.10中加入的。

trans-unit.source: Enables high-DPI scaling in Qt on supported platforms (see also High DPI Displays). Supported platforms are X11, Windows and Android. Enabling makes Qt scale the main (device independent) coordinate system according to display scale factors provided by the operating system. This corresponds to setting the QT_AUTO_SCREEN​_SCALE_FACTOR environment variable to 1. This attribute must be set before QGuiApplication is constructed. This value was added in Qt 5.6.

Enables high-DPI scaling in Qt on supported platforms (see also High DPI Displays). Supported platforms are X11, Windows and Android. Enabling makes Qt scale the main (device independent) coordinate system according to display scale factors provided by the operating system. trans-unit.source: Enables key event compression if set, and disables it if not set. By default key compression is off, so widgets receive one key press event for each key press (or more, since autorepeat is usually on). If you turn it on and your program doesn't keep up with key input, Qt may try to compress key events so that more than one character can be processed in each event. For example, a word processor widget might receive 2, 3 or more characters in each QKeyEvent::text(), if the layout recalculation takes too long for the CPU. If a widget supports multiple character unicode input, it is always safe to turn the compression on. Qt performs key event compression only for printable characters. Qt::Modifier keys, cursor movement keys, function keys and miscellaneous action keys (e.g. Escape, Enter, Backspace, PrintScreen) will stop key event compression, even if there are more compressible key events available. Platforms other than Mac and X11 do not support this compression, in which case turning it on will have no effect. This is set/cleared by the widget's author.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则启用键事件压缩，如果未设置，则禁用它。默认情况下，按键压缩处于关闭状态，因此小部件在每次按键时都会收到一个按键事件（或更多，因为自动重复通常是打开的）。如果打开它，并且程序跟不上键盘输入的速度，Qt可能会尝试压缩键盘事件，以便在每个事件中可以处理多个字符。例如，如果布局重新计算对于CPU来说花费的时间太长，则字处理器窗口小部件可能会在每个QKeyEvent :: text（）中接收2、3个或更多字符。如果窗口小部件支持多个字符unicode输入，则始终可以安全地打开压缩。 Qt仅对可打印字符执行键事件压缩。Qt ::修饰符键，光标移动键，功能键和其他操作键（例如，Escape，Enter，Backspace，PrintScreen）将停止键事件压缩，即使还有更多可压缩的键事件可用。Mac和X11以外的平台均不支持此压缩，在这种情况下，将其无效。这是由小部件的作者设置/清除的。

trans-unit.source: Enables notifications about resets of the OpenGL context. The status is then queryable via the context's isValid() function. Note that not setting this flag does not guarantee that context state loss never occurs. Additionally, some implementations may choose to report context loss regardless of this flag. Platforms that support dynamically enabling the monitoring of the loss of context, such as, Windows with WGL, or Linux/X11 (xcb) with GLX, will monitor the status in every call to makeCurrent(). See isValid() for more information on this.

Enables the Spatial Navigation feature, which means the ability to navigate between focusable elements, such as hyperlinks and form controls, on a web page by using the Left, Right, Up and Down arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 启用空间导航功能,即通过使用左、右、上、下箭头键在网页上的可聚焦元素(如超链接和表单控件)之间导航的能力。

trans-unit.source: Enables the Spatial Navigation feature, which means the ability to navigate between focusable elements, such as hyperlinks and form controls, on a web page by using the Left, Right, Up and Down arrow keys. For example, if a user presses the Right key, heuristics determine whether there is an element they might be trying to reach towards the right and which element they probably want. Disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 启用空间导航功能,这意味着能够通过使用左、右、上、下箭头键在网页上的可聚焦元素(如超链接和表单控件)之间导航。例如,如果用户按了右键,启发式方法就会确定是否有一个他们可能试图向右移动的元素,以及他们可能想要的元素。默认情况下是禁用的。

trans-unit.source: Enabling mipmaps creates many smaller copies of the image at an additional 1/3 memory usage. Each mipmap dimension is halved from the one preceding it, and is downsized in image editing tool with good image resampling. The result speeds up rendering, decreases the time that the graphics card uses for texture lookup, and also reduces aliasing artifacts such as moiré effects or texture subsampling.
Enabling the Infrastructure
